title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the default values of the report parameters are not displayed in the value box.
EB: Expected behavior is that the default values should be shown in the value box, allowing the user to modify the parameter they want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create several report parameters and only set default values for them. 
2. Drag these parameters to the layout. 
3. Preview the report and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
